title: Prochlorperazine
summary: Prochlorperazine, formerly[1] sold under the brand name Compazine among others, is a medication used to treat nausea, schizophrenia, migraines, and anxiety.[2][3][4] It is a less preferred medication for anxiety.[2] It may be taken by mouth, rectally, injection into a vein, or injection into a muscle.[2]
